comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This looks like the 1914 Niagara Falls Peace Conference.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: swanq: This does look like the 1914 Niagara Peace Conference based on the people depicted and similar Bain images.  Richard Arthur Norton: I believe the man shown is Frederick W. Lehman, not Philip. A San Francisco Chronicle article for May 11, 1914 reports that  Frederick W. Lehman of St. Louis, former Solicitor General;  and Associate Justice Lamar of the US Supreme Court were chosen to be the US representatives at the peace conference.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks Wystan for making the connection between these photos and the 1914 Niagara Peace Conference.  We will update the descriptions.
